item.description:
Cohousing is a type of neighborhood designed and managed by the people who live there. Cohousing combines privacy and community in a clustered, pedestrian-oriented neighborhood.  People share resources and communicate in a voluntary way.

You own your own home, as well as a share of the common facilities. The common buildings include a large dining room, kitchen, living room, children's space, exercise room, and workshops. 

We have 2, 3 and 4 bedroom homes still available for sale!

Open Houses are 2nd and 4th Sundays at 1pm.  Come by for a tour.

http://www.sawyerhill.org
item.name: Sawyer Hill EcoVillage: Mosaic Commons & Camelot Cohousing
